item.title: Tweets about Mueller Investigation
item.description: On Monday (Oct. 30th), the first charges were filed in the Mueller investigation on potential connections between the Trump campaign and the Kremlin. It’s major political news, so I wanted to capture as much of the relevant tweets as I could. In this post, I’ve documented the step-by-step of how I went about collecting the data. 1. Install and load rtweet Although I expect to update rtweet on CRAN very soon, the code below assumes the installed version of rtweet is at least version '0.
